content: flap or as many as you wish just make sure to pick up the same number of stitches on each side of the heel flap work the 35 35 instep stitches in stockinette pick up and knit 15 17 stitches along the heel flap knit 8 11 stitches this is the new beginning of round gusset decreases round 1 knit until there are two stitches left before the instep k2tog work the instep stitches in stockinette ssk knit to end of round round 2 knit repeat these two rounds until there are 25 37 sole stitches left foot work even in stockinette until the sock measures 5 cm / 2 less than the desired foot length toe set-up size s only knit 15 sts this is the new beginning of round the next 30 stitches are instep stitches the other 30 stitches are sole stitches toe set-up size m only knit 18 sts this is the new beginning of round the next 36 stitches are instep stitches the other 36 stitches are sole stitches toe decreases round 1 k1 ssk knit until there are 3 instep stitches left k2tog k2 ssk knit until there are 3 sole stitches left k2tog k1 round 2 knit repeat rounds 1-2 until there are 24 24 stitches left 12 instep stitches and 12 sole stitches finishing cut yarn leaving a 12-inch 30 cm tail graft the stitches together using kitchener stitch or work 3-needle bind-off weave in ends knittitude 2014 3 leg pattern multiple of 12 stitches leg pattern chart round 1 *k2 sl 1 p1 sl1 k7* round 2 *k1 cr k1 cluster k6* round 3 *k1 sl 1 p3 sl 1 k6* round 4 *cr k3 cluster k5* round 5 *sl 1 p5 sl1 k5* round 6 knit rounds 7-14 repeat rounds 5-6 four times round 15 *sl 1 p5 sl 1 k5* round 16 *cluster k3 cr k5* round 17 *k1 sl 1 p3 sl 1 k6* round 18 *k1 cluster k1 cr k6* round 19 *k2 sl 1 p1 sl 1 k7* round 20 *k2 c3 k7* symbols and abbreviations k = knit p = purl sl = slip_stitch purlwise without knitting c3 cable 3 = move 1 stitch on cable needle and hold to front of work slip the next stitch knitwise move 1 stitch on cable needle and hold to back of work move the slipped stitch back to the left needle knit 1 stitch from cable needle back k1 knit 1 stitch from cable needle front in practice you are moving the rightmost st to the left over the middle stitch and the leftmost stitch to the right under the middle stitch and then knitting all three sts cr cable right = move 1 stitch on cable needle and hold to back of work k1 k1 from cable needle cluster cable left = move 1 stitch on cable needle and hold to front of work k1 k1 from cable needle ssk = slip 1 stitch knitwise slip
